alert.note: Alert for Converse County Lower Elevations; North Laramie Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 2:04PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Albany and southwestern Converse Counties through 245 PM MDT... At 204 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Campbell Creek Campground, or 26 miles southwest of Douglas, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Campbell Creek Campground and Laprele Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Converse County Lower Elevations; North Laramie Range
